abstract: Despite reporting strong quarterly results, Intel suffered a blow to its stock when it unveiled a decidedly less-than-bullish forecast. Still, Craig Barrett, the chipmaking giant’s chairman, defends his company’s outlook as average.
lead_paragraph: Despite reporting strong quarterly results, Intel suffered a blow to its stock when it unveiled a decidedly less-than-bullish forecast. Still, Craig Barrett, the chipmaking giant’s chairman, defends his company’s outlook as average.

headline.main: A Gloomy Outlook for Intel, or Just Average?
